pageContext.claim: “[Patel is] investing billions of dollars in the United States, and he's only doing it because of what I've done to bring back the steel industry...And one of the reasons he's spending a billion dollars in Alabama, and more money in other places in the United States, is because we brought it back.”
pageContext.analysis: The chairman of ArcelorMittal said the company was "going to announce a multi-billion-dollar investment in Alabama state" but the company has not yet made the announcement.
